headline: Supervisor, U.S. Department of Homeland Security, Immigration and Customs Enforcement

defaultPosition.location: Atlanta Field Office, Charlotte, North Carolina
defaultPosition.title: Supervisor

positions.location: Atlanta Field Office, Charlotte, North Carolina
positions.title: Supervisor

positions.location: San Juan Field Office, San Juan, Puerto Rico
positions.title: Special Agent-Immigration and Naturalization Service

positions.description:
Received, carried out, and delegated orders from my commanding officers in both training as well as combat operations. Fully accountability of Marines and their weapons, equipment, and personal gear under my charge. 

Planned and executed training exercises from small units up to platoon sized elements. 

Non-commissioned officer duty, security posts duty both static, as well as mobile patrol. Cultivated team building skills, which were enhanced by overcoming set obstacles in training and in theater.
positions.title: Squad Leader

positions.description:
Conducted offensive infantry tactics in confined spaces, ashore and afloat, to restore breached security and provide the final barrier/element of an integrated security plan for the asset breached. 

As a corporal of the guard/security supervisor, I planned, evaluated, and supervised the implementation of site-specific security plans to protect assets designated as vital to national security.  In addition, I oversaw personnel while on the job, ensured policies and regulations were enforced, reported violations, prevented unauthorized access in restricted areas. 

I developed schedules for training, executed tasks from upper management, planned, conducted, and taught weekly training on topics related to security force duties.
positions.location: Marine Corps Security Force Company, San Diego, CA
positions.title: Corporal of the guard/Security Forces
